item.title: Flocking to precious metal ETFs? Keep an eye out for these tax surprises
item.description: Precious metals are rallying, but investors who are buying into the trade could be in for some tax complexity.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades consumer goods stock on confidence in second-half acceleration
